consultation.youAreInWaiting: We are putting you through, please wait.

consultations.browserNotSupported: Your browser is not supported for a session. Try to open the link in Safari (IOS) or Chrome. If you are opening this link from Outlook (IOS), you should have an option to open this page in another browser from the (...) menu at the bottom of this page.
consultations.yourBrowserIsNotCompatible: Your browser is not compatible with our application, please update it or use a newer device. For this telecommunication, you need:
consultations.theBrowsersCurrentlySupported: The latest versions of the following browsers are currently supported:
consultations.forIOSPhones: For iOS phones and tablets: Safari
consultations.forAndroidPhones: For Android phones and tablets: Chrome
consultations.forMacOSComputers: For macOS computers: Safari, Chrome, Firefox

info.duringTheTransition: During the transition between hospital and home, which is a period of increased fragility for Service users, home caregivers and local doctors sometimes require information from the Geneva University Hospitals (HUG) Integrated Service user File (DPI), in order to strengthen continuity of care and allow the Service user to be kept at home as much as possible.
info.aimsToStrengthen: aims to strengthen this continuity of care between {{branding}} and the home, especially during the acute transitional care period (SAT) by providing an informed medical response by HUG doctors to Imad caregivers’ questions. This pilot project in which you are participating is a project coordinated by HUG in collaboration with imad. For the moment, it only involves Service users discharged from a recent hospitalisation at HUG (<1 month) with follow-up treatment at home by a caregiver from the Eaux-Vives Home Maintenance Centre (CMD), or supported as part of the Cogeria project in partnership with the CMD Servette. This pilot has been deployed by
info.andTheGeneral: and the General Directorate of Health of the State of Geneva, whom we would like to thank. The doctors providing this service are experienced heads of clinics from
info.accessibleTime1: 5 p.m. to 9 p.m. Monday to Friday
info.accessibleTime2: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. at weekends and on public holidays.
info.theCaregiverImad: Before requesting the {{branding}} service for their Service user, the imad caregiver should ensure that the following prerequisites have been met:
info.itIsNot: This is not a life-threatening emergency
info.patientHasConstent: The Service user has given consent for this video call
info.theAttendingPhysician: The attending requester is not available or has given his consent for this call
info.thePatientWasRecently: The Service user was recently hospitalised at {{branding}} (< 1 month)

login.translationRequestAccepted: Thank you for the confirmation, you will receive the information via email very soon.
login.translationRequestRefused: Thank you for your feedback, we will inform the caregiver of the unavailability.
login.homeIsAHUGTeleconsultation: {{branding}} is a remote audio/video call system. You are about to join a remote session. Please do not leave this page once the session request is in progress.
login.thisApplicationIsIntented: This application is intended to work via an invitation link. Click on this link beforehand to open a session.
login.theInvitationIsNotOrNoLongerValide: This invitation link is no longer valid or has already been used. Another invitation will be sent
login.openTheConsultation: Open the session in the application
login.youDoNotWantToInstall: You do not want to install the application?
login.ifYouHaveReceivedThisInvitation: If you have received this invitation, copy and paste the received link into your browser.
login.ifYouReceivedThisInvitation: If you received this invitation, copy and paste the received link into your browser or copy the invitation key here:
login.thisAppOnlyWorksByInivitation: This application only works by invitation. Please use the session link that your caregiver has sent you.
login.pleaseWaitWhileYourRequest: Please wait while your request is being processed.
login.addTheEventToYourCalendar: Add the event to your calendar
login.theRemoteServerIsNotReachable: The remote server cannot be reached, please check your connectivity
login.unsupportedBrowser: Your browser is not supported for a session. Try to open the link in Safari (IOS) or Chrome. If you are opening this link from Outlook (IOS), you should have an option to open this page in another browser from the (...) menu at the bottom of this page.

translatorForm.youAboutToJoinInviteWithPatientAndDOctor: {{branding}} is a remote video/audio call system. You are about to accept an online appointment with a Service user and caregiver.
translatorForm.pleaseFillYourInfo: Please fill in the information below so that we can contact you with access to the session.
translatorForm.name: First and last name
translatorForm.nameIsRequired: Please enter the interpreter’s first and last name
translatorForm.directNumberIsRequired: Please enter a direct phone number
translatorForm.directNumberIsInvalid: The number must be in the international format 00XX or + XX

closeConsultation.youAreAboutTo:
You are about to cancel the session request. If you cancel at this level, you will lose your position in the queue and you will have to re-request a session.


Are you sure you want to cancel?
closeConsultation.pleaseFillUpInformation: Please fill in the information below so that we can contact you with access to the session.
closeConsultation.youAreGoingToAcceptFutureConsultation: {{branding}} is a video/audio call system. You are about to accept a future online appointment with a Service user and caregiver.

test.ifThisIsTheFirst: If this is the first time that you are joining a session, we advise you to test your configuration using the button below.
test.welcomeToTheHome: Welcome to the {{branding}} platform. This page helps to ensure that your device will perform as expected on the day of the consultation. Click on the button below to check compatibility. You will need to accept requests for access to your camera and your microphone.
test.yourDeviceAppears: Your device seems to be having problems with the Teleconnect system. We advise you to try using another browser if possible, to check your updates, or try on another device.
test.yourDeviceSeems: Your device seems to be perfectly compatible with the Teleconnect system. If the video preview is not of sufficient quality or is choppy, please check that your equipment signal is sufficient.
test.youCanStillJoin: You can still join session but video/audio call might fails.
test.micDenied: Access to camera seems working but access to the microphone is denied.
test.cameraDenied: Access to microphone seems working but access to the camera is denied.
test.bothDenied: Access to camera and microphone is denied.
test.micAndCamRequesting: The system needs to have access to your camera and microphone to work properly. Please ensure to accept permission request.
test.permissionError: We have encountered a problem for accessing to your camera or your microphone. Please ensure the devices are properly connected.

requestConsultation.theCallIsNotFor: The call is not about a life-threatening emergency
requestConsultation.thePatientHas: The Service user has consented to make the call
requestConsultation.theAttendingPhysician: The attending requester is not available or has given his consent

request_consultation.request_form_title: Once submitted, you will be redirected automatically in the session request. You will able to cancel until an expert will handle the request.

common.connectionFailed: The connection to the server is not functioning properly, and you can no longer receive session requests. If the issue persists, refresh the page.
